powerconsumption: Approx. 24.0 W (Typical) (REC mode, HD-SDI Dual Link On, EVF On, LCD Monitor Off)
imagingdevice: Super 35mm Equivalent Single Chip Exmor CMOS Image Sensor
recordingplaybacktime: HQ mode: Approx. 100 min with SBP-32 (32 GB) memory card; approx. 50 min with SBP-16 (16 GB) memory card SP/SD mode : Approx. 140 min with SBP-32 (32 GB) memory card; approx. 70 min with SBP-16 (16 GB) memory card
lensmount: PL mount (with supplied lens mount adapter)
